textSub.name: para1
textSub.string:
Sometimes life gets a little bit hectic. That's when smart
 fish look for the Flash Bomb bubble. This power-up is a
 potent ally in these mine-infested waters.

textSub.name: para2
textSub.string:
HINT:
 Did you know that the eating a Flash Bomb bubble will
 cause all the mines on the screen to explode?
